## PR Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md) and followed best practices.
- [ ] I have added or updated tests as needed.
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed.
- [ ] I have verified that CI passes and the code builds/works as expected.
- [ ] I have checked for breaking changes and documented them if any.
